sentence.Network_en: As tobacco cigarette burns, a potpourri of 4000 chemicals is released, including carbon monoxide and hydrocyanic acid.
sentence.Network_cn: 当烟被点燃时，融合了四千种化学品的气体被释放出来，其中包括一氧化碳和氢氰酸。

sentence.Network_en: Even so, there is a slight odour of potpourri emanating from Longfellow.
sentence.Network_cn: 纵然如此, 也还是可以闻到来自朗费罗的一种轻微的杂烩的味道.

entry.tran: 百花香（各种不同的干花瓣和叶子的混合物，可使室内空气芬芳）
entry.def: Potpourri is a mixture of dried petals and leaves from different flowers. Potpourri is used to make rooms smell pleasant.
A potpourri of things is a collection of various different items which were not originally intended to form a group.

example.ex: ...a potpourri of architectural styles from all over the world.
example.tran: 世界各地建筑风格的荟萃

means.word_mean: 1. a collection containing a variety of sorts of things;

sentences.sentence: "a great assortment of cars was on display"

means.word_mean: 2. a musical composition consisting of a series of songs or other musical pieces from various sources
3. a jar of mixed flower petals and spices used as perfume
